title: mana sAkSiyin
sahitya:
mana sAkSiyain vazhi nI naDandAl vAimaiyAga nI vAzhalAm manamE


anupallavi

  enadiyAnenum irumAppai viTTu iraivanukkukk-unnaiyE Indu shAntamAga


caraNam    mAri kODai ADi vadanta kAlangaL vAniyarkkai vazhi vandu selvadu pOl
kAriya uyirum karuma yOgam sheidu kavalaiyaTra kAmya vAzhvuDanE
